name: family-todo-app
description: Family Todo App - MCP-powered task management for families

scripts.build: npm run build -w @family-todo/frontend && npm run build -w @family-todo/mcp
scripts.test: npm run test -w @family-todo/mcp && npm run test -w @family-todo/frontend
scripts.docker:reset-test-db: docker compose -p scheduler-test -f docker-compose.test.yaml down pocketbase && docker volume rm -f scheduler-test_pb_data_test && docker compose -p scheduler-test -f docker-compose.test.yaml up -d pocketbase && sleep 2
scripts.docker:test: npm run docker:reset-test-db && docker compose -p scheduler-test -f docker-compose.test.yaml run --rm runner sh -c 'npm install && npm test'
scripts.docker:test:mcp: npm run docker:reset-test-db && docker compose -p scheduler-test -f docker-compose.test.yaml run --rm runner sh -c 'npm install && npm run test:mcp'
